extension.name: Module - What is my IP
extension.author: Rinenweb
extension.description:
What is my IP Module

This simple module shows the IP address of the current user browsing the site with a small greeting of your choice.

field.name: Greeting
field.default: You are connecting to this site from:
field.label: Greeting before IP
field.description: What text you would like to display before the IP
